title: Banana Pi Teases Open Source Router with Triductor TR6560+TR5220 Wi-Fi SoC
description: Banana Pi recently showcased a Mini router designed with the  Triductor TR6560 along with TR5220 Wi-Fi System-on-Chip. Some key features of the Banana Pi BPI-Wi-Fi6 Mini are its GbE LAN port and its GbE WAN port for wired connectivity. This device shares a familiar form-factor with the previously launched Banana Pi BPI-R3 Mini Router board […]
